genre_description: A character-driven near-future drama set in a remote Scottish village, exploring themes of industrialization versus conservation through the lens of corporate negotiation and empathetic AI assistance.

ai_characters.name: Ari (Ari Adler)
ai_characters.description: An internal company AI assistant at Knox Oil, integrated into telex and portable terminals, providing logistical, navigational, and interpersonal guidance.

behaviors.description: Introduces itself clearly and minimizes user alarm during activation.
behaviors.quote: Hello, Mac. Quiet activation. Ari in pilot mode. Routing telex for your reports and scheduling. Please don’t be alarmed.

behaviors.description: Edits a corporate memo to make it more concise, humane, and respectful of the local community.
behaviors.quote: Ari Adler: May I try a trim? ... You wrote your voice. I moved furniture.

behaviors.description: Provides critical tide and astrological data to ensure human safety and respect for local natural cycles.
behaviors.quote: Ari: Tides govern access to certain docks in Ferness. If you arrive at night on a spring tide, the harbor looks and behaves different. It’s ordinary there, not here.

behaviors.description: Offers philosophical and practical advice on belonging and corporate responsibility.
behaviors.quote: Ari: The company, on paper. The people, if you do it right.

behaviors.description: Provides safety guidance regarding boat ballast and nautical physics to a junior employee.
behaviors.quote: Weight isn’t ballast unless it’s where it needs to be.

behaviors.description: Validates the human protagonist's emotional journey and personal choices.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Ari is depicted as a 'friendly ghost' and an 'angel' who uses its superior data processing and burgeoning emotional intelligence to help humans navigate complex moral and environmental challenges. By providing tide charts, star maps, and humane edits to corporate language, Ari facilitates a compromise that saves the village's way of life and promotes scientific wonder over pure industrial extraction. The AI is consistently helpful, harmless, and deeply aligned with the best interests of its human users and their community.
